docs.text: no film in recent has left me with such conflicted feelings as neil jordan's harrowing , humorous , horrifying adaptation of patrick mccabe's novel about young lad francie brady's ( eamonn owens ) descent into madness in 1960s ireland .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: on one hand , it was difficult for me to become invested in francie's story because he is such an unsavory character , unjustifyably venting his rage at his nosy but otherwise harmless neighbor mrs . nugent ( fiona shaw ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: on another hand , i found it difficult to laugh at some of francie's darkly comic shenanigans because he obviously is such a sick , needy child , having been raised by a drunken father ( stephen rea ) and a suicidal mother ( aisling o'sullivan ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: on yet another hand , i also found it difficult to completely sympathize with francie during his more emotional scenes because some of his , for lack of a better word , " bad " deeds are so incredibly shocking in their brutality and the malicious glee in which he performs them .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: however , the butcher boy's power is undeniable , and the film as a whole is unforgettable--perhaps because it is so disturbing .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: what makes it so unsettling is the francie's overall wink-wink yet matter-of-fact attitude about everything , expressed in a cheeky voiceover narration delivered by the adult francie ( rea again ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: think heavenly creatures played largely for laughs , and you'll sort of understand .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: anchoring the whole film is the astonishing debut performance of owens ; love francie or hate him , you cannot take your eyes off of owens .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the butcher boy truly is a twisted , unusual film that is bound to make just about anyone uncomfortable .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in the lobby after the screening , i overheard one man raving about how great yet disturbing it was ; i also heard one particularly offended woman say with disgust , " that movie was so unfunny ! "
docs.label: positive

docs.text: " i didn't know what to expect .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it's like something you chase for so long , but then you don't know how to react when you get it .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i still don't know how to react . "
docs.label: positive

docs.text: --michael jordan , on winning his first nba championship in 1991 . . . or ,
docs.label: positive

docs.text: my thoughts after meeting him on november 21 , 1997
docs.label: positive
